questions.questionText: What would your friends describe you as?

options.text: Outspoken
Shy
Reserved

questions.questionText: You arrive early to a kickback at your friends house and everyone one there are strangers. What would you do?

options.text: Make new friends and have the time of my life, DUH.
Leave.
Sit quietly in the corner and only speak when spoken to, while waiting for my friends to arrive.

questions.questionText: You’re out with friends in a public place and they’re acting wild. What do you do?

options.text: Are you stupid? Act wild with them!
Laugh and apologize for their behavior to random strangers.
Walk across the street while holding you head down to avoid being seen.

questions.questionText: Your crush is working at your local grocery store! They’re working the only cash register open. What do you do?

options.text: Flirt with them at the register then slide him your number.
Attempt to make the transaction fast as possible and leave out the store in a hurry.
Leave the damn building.

questions.questionText: You’re at your families reunion and you have no idea who half these people are. What do you do?

options.text: Burst through the door exclaiming “the party has arrived.
Smile occasionally at them while making your way to your cousins room.
Pull out your phone or book that you brought with you and hide in a corner.

questions.questionText: All of your friends are planning to hang out but you simply don’t want to leave you bed. How do you handle this situation?

options.text: Straight up tell them you don’t want to go.
Make an excuse telling them that you’re busy that day.
Agree to go out even tho you don’t really want to.

questions.questionText: It’s finally  the weekend! What are your plans for the night?

options.text: I’m going out with my friends! We about to PAR-TAY (party)!
Invite a few friends over to watch a movie and maybe bake some goodies.
Scroll through social media or read a book. Maybe even have a lil spa day to myself.

questions.questionText: Get riled up sis, it’s your birthday! What are your plans for the night?

options.text: I’m throwing a HUGE birthday bash, inviting everyone on my contact list.
I’m inviting a few friends and family over for cake and ice cream. Nothing too special.
Ordering takeout and posting a happy birthday to me on my private social media.

questions.questionText: You got moneeeeyyyy! Which living space is to your taste?

options.text: Million dollar house in the hills baby!
A cute apartment sound good to me.
A nice suburb house in a quiet neighborhood sounds amazing.
You share every last one of your opinions whether it will offend people or not.
You only provide your input when necessary.
You listen but never share what you’re thinking.
